titles.title: A resolution designating April 8, 2006, as "National Cushing's Syndrome Awareness Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/4/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates April 8, 2006, as National Cushing's Syndrome Awareness Day. (Describes Cushing's Syndrome as an endocrine or hormonal disorder that is caused by prolonged exposure of the body's tissue to high levels of the hormone cortisol and that can cause abnormal weight gain, skin changes, and fatigue and lead to diabetes, high blood pressure, osteoporosis, and death.)
